scenario_text.value: (He’s there! But...)
Wow... He’s really been roughed up...

Yeah, he must have got hurt worse than we
thought.
That’s curious too, but more importantly...
Did that thing just get caught up in the fog?

Right? The fog rolled up over its feet, and
now it can’t move anymore?
Even the monsters are affected by the fog.

I wonder why. That fog is scaring me even
more, the more I look at it...
(I get what Shuuji is saying.)

(Agumon and the others are backing off.
Ryo can’t even stand the sight of it.)
I’m scared, of course.
Have so many questions about it.
Mustn’t avert my eyes.

(I’m scared, of course. We’re okay looking at
it, but we should keep our distance.)
(We should wait for Fangmon to leave...)

(Telling me it’s dangerous has the opposite
effect. So many ideas to try from here.)

(Maybe throw a rock at it?
Are there any rocks around here?)

(It’s scary, but if we close our eyes, we
won’t learn anything. We should watch it.)

(We might find some way to deal with it.
We just can’t know...)
GAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!
What was that!!
Stay away! Don’t come any closer!
(Is that Fangmon freaking out?)

No, dammit, no!
This can’t be happening!
No... NOOOOOO!
Huh?!
AHHHHHHHHH!

The fog...
It got Fangmon...
It swallowed him up?!

(That was crueler than I could have
imagined.)
(None of us can even speak.)
